revised_title: Erratum to Paper I: Near-Limiting Gravity Waves in Water
tldr: This article provides an erratum for a previous paper on near-limiting gravity waves in water. It corrects a passage in the main text regarding the corrections to be applied to certain quantities. The author expresses gratitude to various individuals and institutions for their support and acknowledges the use of the University of London Computer Centre for computations.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Fluid Dynamics
